backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing user profiles with access control and handling public form submissions with validation and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend components and pages in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling for the site.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all top-level routes and wraps the app in the router provider.
frontend/src/components/archive/ArchiveB: Tabbed archive browser that filters items by category and opens a detail dialog for selected entries.
frontend/src/components/archive/ArchiveI: Dialog displaying full metadata, description, notes, and source citations for a selected archive item.
frontend/src/components/common/SourcesCi: Component rendering a sources list or a placeholder when citations are missing.
frontend/src/components/contributions/Co: Form component for submitting contributions with validation, state handling, and API submission via useSubmitContribution.
frontend/src/components/contributions/Su: Displays a success message and reset button after a contribution is submitted.
frontend/src/components/current-generati: Renders a profile card showing a family member’s name, titles, and description.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with copyright text and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout wrapping navigation, main content, and footer with a parchment background.
frontend/src/components/lineage/FamilyTr: Displays lineage data as a hierarchical tree on desktop and an accordion on mobile, with person detail popups.
frontend/src/components/lineage/PersonDe: Dialog panel showing detailed information about a selected lineage person.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Responsive top navigation bar with desktop links and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/timeline/Timelin: Accordion-based timeline list showing events, descriptions, and optional sources.
frontend/src/content/archive.ts: Static dataset of archive items including photographs and documents with metadata.
frontend/src/content/currentGeneration.t: Static profiles describing current-generation members of the Sharma family.
frontend/src/content/historyContent.ts: Defines structured historical content for the founding era and Akhnoor sovereignty, including titles, sections, and placeholder research notes.
frontend/src/content/lineage.ts: Provides an array describing the Sharma family lineage with IDs, titles, periods, and brief biographies.
frontend/src/content/timeline.ts: Exports chronological timeline data detailing major events in the Sharma family's history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook for setting the document title and meta description on page load or update.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module noting that backend interactions are handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContribution: Defines a mutation hook to submit contributions via the backend actor and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive CSS variables defining light and dark heritage-themed color palettes and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app in the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AkhnoorSovereigntyPag: Renders the Akhnoor Sovereignty history page, setting page metadata and displaying structured content sections with optional citations.
frontend/src/pages/ContactContributionsP: Displays a contributions contact page with a form, success state handling, and descriptive text about submitting materials.
frontend/src/pages/CurrentGenerationPage: Shows profiles for the current Sharma family generation and includes a section on preserving family traditions.
frontend/src/pages/FortsResidencesPage.t: Presents detailed information about Akhnoor Fort and other residences using styled cards and historical descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/FoundingEraPage.tsx: Renders the Founding Era history page, mapping structured content with sections, paragraphs, and sources.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryArchivesPage.t: Displays the archive and gallery browser with page metadata and a brief introduction.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and highlight cards linking to key areas of the archive.
frontend/src/pages/LineageFamilyTreePage: Shows the family tree visualization with metadata and a note on the current generation.
frontend/src/pages/Post1947TransitionPag: Renders the Post-1947 Transition history page, setting meta tags and displaying structured content sections with optional citations and a future research block.
frontend/src/pages/RoyalAdministrationLe: Renders the Royal Administration & Legacy page, applying meta tags and showing historical sections with citations and an optional future research notice.
frontend/src/pages/TimelinePage.tsx: Displays the historical timeline page, setting meta tags and rendering the TimelineList component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading and persisting URL parameters via query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme options for the site.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, design principles, features, and required images for the heritage archive site.
